attributes.action: Explain why it appears standard rate taxpayers are the ONLY people paying the appropriate rate in this country.
attributes.additional_details: There is information that eBay has joined the HUGE list of organisations and individuals who manage to avoid paying any or much income tax in this country.  They are ablel to do this because we are talking about HUGE AMOUNTS OF MONEY - we standard rate taxpayers, of course, have no access to the government supported tax avoidance scheme in place because we are not rich enough. Why is this being allowed to happen.  Mr Slippery needs to make a public statement to let us know why we should continue to allow him to let this happen!
